page.title: 06Shops in Wolsingham
page.content: Wolsingham has a variety of small shops which survive against the competition from Supermarkets in nearby towns.In the Market Place,there are two{hardware/general}dealers,two cafes,two knitwear shops,a butchers,a bank,a post office,a chemists and a newsagents.Mrs Gascoigne sells Ladieswear and attracts custom from a wide area. Wolsingham shops offer{a wide range {of services;}very little is not available.There is no baker and furniture and carpets cannot be obtained. Among general grocers,{Anton's}is quite famous.A very wide range of foodstuffs of high quality,extensive opening hours and salesmanship of a highly individual nature are its main features.
